name: marketing_spends
description: A table that keeps track of Bindle's marketing investments per campaign, per day.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of spend, just a primary key in a table.

columns.name: spent_at
columns.description: The date of a spend. Spend data is usually reported by date.

columns.name: clicks
columns.description: Number of clicks on the ad on this date.
